summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2853 for the improvement of Alley in Block 18, A. A. Denny's Addition, being the alley between Fifth Avenue and Sixth Avenue, from Pike Street to Pine Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing necessary retaining walls, filling and planking, under Ordinance No. 34580, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
